column2: -2.095865284287452 Caryn at Kirkcarrion https://www.thisisdurham.com/inspire-me/durhams-unmissable-highlights/legends-of-durham/kirkcarrion-teesdale Crowned by its Victorian pine copse
column3: the Bronze Age cairn of Kirkcarrion is said not only to mark the resting place of the Brigantian chieftain Caryn
column4: but to host his ghostly presence for those who dare to visit.
